item.title: [kdr] Make Obsolete
item.description:
Instant

Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Lost Legacy
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose a nonartifact, nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles their library, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

item.title: [kdr] Longtusk Cub
item.description:
Creature — Cat

Whenever Longtusk Cub deals combat damage to a player, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

Pay {E}{E}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Longtusk Cub.

item.title: [kdr] Live Fast
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw two cards, lose 2 life, and get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

item.title: [kdr] Lifecrafter's Bestiary
item.description:
Artifact

At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.

Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [kdr] Lifecraft Cavalry
item.description:
Creature — Elf Warrior

Trample

Revolt — Lifecraft Cavalry enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [kdr] Leave in the Dust
item.description:
Instant

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

Draw a card.

item.title: [kdr] Lathnu Sailback
item.description: Creature — Lizard

item.title: [kdr] Kujar Seedsculptor
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

When Kujar Seedsculptor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

item.title: [kdr] Key to the City
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.

Whenever Key to the City becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [kdr] Kari Zev, Skyship Raider
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Pirate

First strike, menace

Whenever Kari Zev, Skyship Raider attacks, create Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey creature token. Ragavan enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

item.title: [kdr] Kari Zev's Expertise
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature or Vehicle until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

You may cast a spell with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [kdr] Kambal, Consul of Allocation
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Advisor

Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [kdr] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [kdr] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [kdr] Island
item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [kdr] Irontread Crusher
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.title: [kdr] Invigorated Rampage
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Target creature gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

• Two target creatures each get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Inventor's Goggles
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+2.

Whenever an Artificer enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Inventor's Goggles to it.

Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [kdr] Inventors' Fair
item.description:
Legendary Land

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or more artifacts, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {C}.

{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Inventors' Fair: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

item.title: [kdr] Inventor's Apprentice
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Inventor's Apprentice gets +1/+1 as long as you control an artifact.

item.title: [kdr] Inspiring Vantage
item.description:
Land

Inspiring Vantage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.

{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

item.title: [kdr] Inspired Charge
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Indomitable Creativity
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy X target artifacts and/or creatures. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until an artifact or creature card is revealed and exiles that card. Those players put the exiled cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle their libraries.

item.title: [kdr] Implement of Malice
item.description:
Artifact

{B}, Sacrifice Implement of Malice: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

When Implement of Malice is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [kdr] Implement of Examination
item.description:
Artifact

{U}, Sacrifice Implement of Examination: Draw a card.

When Implement of Examination is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

item.title: [kdr] Impeccable Timing
item.description:
Instant

Impeccable Timing deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

item.title: [kdr] Illusionist's Stratagem
item.description:
Instant

Exile up to two target creatures you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

Draw a card.

item.title: [kdr] Ice Over
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant artifact or creature

Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

item.title: [kdr] Hunt the Weak
item.description:
Sorcery

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

item.title: [kdr] Hungry Flames
item.description:
Instant

Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

item.title: [kdr] Hope of Ghirapur
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Thopter

Flying

Sacrifice Hope of Ghirapur: Until your next turn, target player who was dealt combat damage by Hope of Ghirapur this turn can't cast noncreature spells.

item.title: [kdr] Hinterland Drake
item.description:
Creature — Drake

Flying

Hinterland Drake can't block artifact creatures.

item.title: [kdr] Hijack
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Highspire Infusion
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

item.title: [kdr] Highspire Artisan
item.description:
Creature — Elf Artificer

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

item.title: [kdr] Hidden Stockpile
item.description:
Enchantment

Revolt — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1.

item.title: [kdr] Heroic Intervention
item.description:
Instant

Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Herald of the Fair
item.description:
Creature — Human

When Herald of the Fair enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Herald of Anguish
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

Flying

At the beginning of your end step, each opponent discards a card.

{1}{B}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Heart of Kiran
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Vehicle

Flying, vigilance

Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

You may remove a loyalty counter from a planeswalker you control rather than pay Heart of Kiran's crew cost.

item.title: [kdr] Hazardous Conditions
item.description:
Sorcery

Creatures with no counters on them get -2/-2 until end of turn.

item.title: [kdr] Harnessed Lightning
item.description:
Instant

Choose target creature. You get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. Harnessed Lightning deals that much damage to that creature.

item.title: [kdr] Greenbelt Rampager
item.description:
Creature — Elephant

When Greenbelt Rampager enters the battlefield, pay {E}{E} (two energy counters). If you can't, return Greenbelt Rampager to its owner's hand and you get {E}.

item.title: [kdr] Gonti, Lord of Luxury
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Aetherborn Rogue

Deathtouch

When Gonti, Lord of Luxury enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

item.title: [kdr] Glint-Sleeve Siphoner
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Menace

Whenever Glint-Sleeve Siphoner enters the battlefield or attacks, you get {E} (an energy counter).

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [kdr] Glint-Sleeve Artisan
item.description:
Creature — Dwarf Artificer

Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

item.title: [kdr] Glint-Nest Crane
item.description:
Creature — Bird

Flying

When Glint-Nest Crane enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [kdr] Glimmer of Genius
item.description:
Instant

Scry 2, then draw two cards. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

item.title: [kdr] Gifted Aetherborn
item.description:
Creature — Aetherborn Vampire

Deathtouch, lifelink
